entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is introduced as a character in the conversation. She is described as chipping into the conversation unexpectedly and gazing at Rita with her enormous, protuberant, slightly mad eyes.

entities.name: rita
entities.description: Rita is introduced as a character in the conversation. She is described as looking disparagingly at Luna and snorting loudly when she hears about The Quibbler.

entities.name: the quibbler
entities.description: The Quibbler is introduced as a publication that Luna's father edits. It is described as publishing important stories that he thinks the public needs to know.

entities.name: luna's dad
entities.description: Luna's dad is mentioned as someone who publishes important stories in The Quibbler. He is described as not caring about making money.

relationships.description: Rita expresses disdain for The Quibbler, calling it a 'rag' and saying she could manure her garden with its contents.
Luna's dad is the editor of The Quibbler, publishing important stories that he thinks the public needs to know.
Luna is affiliated with The Quibbler through her father's editorship. She mentions that it's her chance to raise the tone of the publication.
